original_title: Scruff 2 - A Tale of Slightly More Undesirable Men
overview: The dust has settled on the war between the McGee and the McNaught gangs, and Butch finds himself in a brand new environment without the support of his partner in crime. Will he be able to start a new life or will the sins of his past catch up with him? Find out this and more in the thrilling sequel to 2020 classic, "Scruff - A Tale of Undesirable Men"!
tagline: You ride together, you Scruff together!
title: Scruff 2 - A Tale of Slightly More Undesirable Men
